scripts.build_tachyons: cd tachyons && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && node lib/copy_tachyons.js
scripts.deploy_tachyons: git checkout -B deploy && git merge master && npm run commit_tachyons && git push heroku deploy:master -f
scripts.deploy_production: git checkout -B deploy && git merge master && npm run commit_tachyons && git push production deploy:master -f
scripts.deploy: git checkout -B deploy && git merge master && git push heroku deploy:master -f
scripts.commit_tachyons: npm run build_tachyons && git add -f public/tachyons.min.css && git commit -m "deploy"
